` *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Report YGPL_INDEXES_CHECK *---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT ygpl_indexes_check LINE-SIZE 256.
TABLES: tadir, tdevc. TYPE-POOLS: abap, icon.
SELECT-OPTIONS: s_srcs FOR tadir-srcsystem DEFAULT sy-sysid, s_soft FOR tdevc-dlvunit, * s_type FOR tadir-object, s_name FOR tadir-obj_name, s_pack FOR tadir-devclass. PARAMETERS: p_ext TYPE abap_bool AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT abap_true. SELECT-OPTIONS: s_author FOR tadir-author DEFAULT sy-uname.
PARAMETERS: p_size TYPE ygpl_table_size.
DATA r_type TYPE ygpl_tadir_search=>tr_comptype. DATA o_obj_size TYPE ygpl_dba_interfaces=>ti_object_size.
INITIALIZATION. DATA s_type LIKE LINE OF r_type. DATA d_size TYPE ygplidba_tables_size=>td_size.
o_obj_size = ygpl_dba_factories=>get_object_size( ).
s_type-sign = 'I'. s_type-option = 'EQ'. s_type-low = 'TABL'. APPEND s_type TO r_type.
d_size = o_obj_size->db_size / 1024. " DB Size (ko) => (Mo) d_size = d_size / 1000. " 0,1% of db_size p_size = d_size * 1000. " 3 decimals
START-OF-SELECTION. DATA t_list TYPE ygpl_tadir_search=>tt_compkeys. DATA d_table_name TYPE ygplidba_tables_size=>td_table_name. DATA d_table_size TYPE ygplidba_tables_size=>td_size. DATA o_check TYPE REF TO ygpl_check_indexes. FIELD-SYMBOLS: <i> LIKE LINE OF t_list. DATA r_size_filter TYPE ygplidba_tables_size=>tr_size.
d_table_size = p_size * 1024. " Mo => Ko r_size_filter = o_obj_size->create_filter_from_lower_limit( d_table_size ).
t_list = ygpl_tadir_search=>get_keys_from_tadir( " Issue 1 srcsystem = s_srcs[] softcomp = s_soft[] type = r_type name = s_name[] packages = s_pack[] ext = p_ext author = s_author[] ).
CREATE OBJECT o_check EXPORTING comp_list = t_list r_size_filter = r_size_filter.
END-OF-SELECTION. DATA t_data TYPE ygpl_check_indexes=>tt_indexes_check_log. t_data = o_check->check_log. CALL FUNCTION 'REUSE_ALV_GRID_DISPLAY' EXPORTING * I_INTERFACE_CHECK = ' ' * I_BYPASSING_BUFFER = ' ' * I_BUFFER_ACTIVE = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_PROGRAM = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_PF_STATUS_SET = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_USER_COMMAND = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_TOP_OF_PAGE = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_HTML_TOP_OF_PAGE = ' ' * I_CALLBACK_HTML_END_OF_LIST = ' ' i_structure_name = 'YGPL_INDEXES_CHECK_RESULT' * I_BACKGROUND_ID = ' ' * I_GRID_TITLE = * I_GRID_SETTINGS = * IS_LAYOUT = * IT_FIELDCAT = * IT_EXCLUDING = * IT_SPECIAL_GROUPS = * IT_SORT = * IT_FILTER = * IS_SEL_HIDE = * I_DEFAULT = 'X' * I_SAVE = ' ' * IS_VARIANT = * IT_EVENTS = * IT_EVENT_EXIT = * IS_PRINT = * IS_REPREP_ID = * I_SCREEN_START_COLUMN = 0 * I_SCREEN_START_LINE = 0 * I_SCREEN_END_COLUMN = 0 * I_SCREEN_END_LINE = 0 * I_HTML_HEIGHT_TOP = 0 * I_HTML_HEIGHT_END = 0 * IT_ALV_GRAPHICS = * IT_HYPERLINK = * IT_ADD_FIELDCAT = * IT_EXCEPT_QINFO = * IR_SALV_FULLSCREEN_ADAPTER = * IMPORTING * E_EXIT_CAUSED_BY_CALLER = * ES_EXIT_CAUSED_BY_USER = TABLES t_outtab = t_data EXCEPTIONS program_error = 1 OTHERS = 2. IF sy-subrc <> 0. MESSAGE ID sy-msgid TYPE sy-msgty NUMBER sy-msgno WITH sy-msgv1 sy-msgv2 sy-msgv3 sy-msgv4. ENDIF.
